Project deliverables
final project deliverables include face detection (existing OpenCV), face recognition (pre-trained model) and facial mask detection (new component developed in this project).
a system processes photos (jpg file) from a dataset, or a simple website for the user to upload a file . a recorded video (mp4 file) is a live video stream .
